text.section:
Subject to the hearing provisions of § 13-2434 of this subtitle, the agency may:
deny a tip jar license or a wholesaler's license to an applicant; or
in accordance with § 13-2437 of this subtitle, discipline a holder of a tip jar license or wholesaler's license.
The agency shall deny a license to an applicant whose tip jar license or wholesaler's license has been revoked.

If the license of a holder of a tip jar license or wholesaler's license is revoked for two separate civil violations under § 13-2437 of this subtitle or a criminal violation under § 13-2424(e) or § 13-2438(a) of this subtitle, the agency may deny a tip jar license or wholesaler's license to:
a corporate or limited liability entity applicant if 50% or more of the capital stock is owned by an individual, or an immediate family member of an individual, whose license was revoked; or
a partnership applicant if the partnership includes as a partner an individual whose license was revoked.
